title: Executive Assistant for an Insurance Agency in US
job_overview:
We are looking for a virtual assistant that can manage Executive duties for the CEO of our insurance agency. Must be able to multi-task and have detailed communication. 

 Duties to include:

-Calendar Management
-Booking travel
-Email Management through Outlook
-Office 365 knowledge
-Some marketing skills
-Have flexible schedule
-Be proactive
-Understanding P&C insurance language and Applied Epic is a plus.
